function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Outdated HVAC system with no cooling","Impact":"Poor indoor climate and air quality, increased risk of heat-related illness","Mitigation":"Upgrade HVAC system to include cooling and improve air circulation","Technologies":"Modern air handling units with cooling capabilities, energy-efficient ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owner, maintenance team"},{"Description":"Fixed utility rooms between corridors","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining hygiene and sanitation, potential for germ transmission","Mitigation":"Reconfigure layout to optimize hygiene and sanitation, implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Modular and movable utility room systems, automated cleaning systems","People":"Occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owner, facilities management team"},{"Description":"Limited use of open-plan office space","Impact":"Reduced flexibility in space utilization, potential congestion in closed office areas","Mitigation":"Redesign space to optimize open-plan concept, create flexible workspace options","Technologies":"Flexible and modular office furniture, space management software","People":"Occupants, facility management team","Owner":"Building owner, space planning team"}]}
